content.1: The wilderness and the solitary place shall be glad for them; and the desert shall rejoice, and blossom as the rose.
content.2: It shall blossom abundantly, and rejoice even with joy and singing: the glory of Lebanon shall be given unto it, the excellency of Carmel and Sharon, they shall see the glory of the
content.3: Strengthen ye the weak hands, and confirm the feeble knees.
content.5: Then the eyes of the blind shall be opened, and the ears of the deaf shall be unstopped.
content.7: And the parched ground shall become a pool, and the thirsty land springs of water: in the habitation of dragons, where each lay,
content.8: And an highway shall be there, and a way, and it shall be called The way of holiness; the unclean shall not pass over it; but it
content.9: No lion shall be there, nor
